mdRecord.dcterms:title: University Symphonic Wind Ensemble
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for University Symphonic Wind Ensemble, conducto: David Widder. Spring winds concert 1989. Program Features: The Glory of the Yankee Navy by John Philip Sousa | Providentes: An Inaugural Fanfare by James Sochinski | Autobiography for Band by Robert Russell Bennett, conducted by William H. Smith, Jr. | Napoli by Herman Bellstedt, Tim Altman, Cornet Soloist | Music for Prague 1968 by Karel Husa |First Suite in E flat by Gustav Holst.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Division of Performing Arts
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Department of Music

Virginia
